00056         private int thumbSize = 15;
00062         [Description("Set Slider thumb size")]
00063         [Category("ColorSlider")]
00064         [DefaultValue(15)]
00065         public int ThumbSize
00066         {
00067                 get { return thumbSize; }
00068                 set
00069                 {
00070                         if (value > 0 &
00071                                 value < (barOrientation == Orientation.Horizontal ? this.ContentRectangle.Width : this.ContentRectangle.Height))
00072                                 thumbSize = value;
00073                         else
00074                                 throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException(
00075                                         "TrackSize has to be greather than zero and lower than half of Slider width");
00076                         Invalidate();
00077                 }
00078         }

00150         public Orientation Orientation
00151         {
00152                 get { return barOrientation; }
00153                 set
00154                 {
00155                         if (barOrientation != value)
00156                         {
00157                                 barOrientation = value;
00158                                 int temp = Width;
00159                                 Width = Height;
00160                                 Height = temp;
00161                                 if (thumbCustomShape != null)
00162                                         thumbSize =
00163                                                 (int)
00164                                                 (barOrientation == Orientation.Horizontal
00165                                                          ? thumbCustomShape.GetBounds().Width
00166                                                          : thumbCustomShape.GetBounds().Height) + 1;
00167                                 Invalidate();
00168                         }
00169                 }

00173         private int trackerValue = 50;
00179         [Description("Set Slider value")]
00180         [Category("ColorSlider")]
00181         [DefaultValue(50)]
00182         public int Value
00183         {
00184                 get { return trackerValue; }
00185                 set
00186                 {
00187                         if (value >= barMinimum & value <= barMaximum)
00188                         {
00189                                 trackerValue = value;
00190                                 if (ValueChanged != null) ValueChanged(this, new EventArgs());
00191                                 Invalidate();
00192                         }
00193                         else throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("Value is outside appropriate range (min, max)");
00194                 }
00195         }

00198         private int barMinimum = 0;
00204         [Description("Set Slider minimal point")]
00205         [Category("ColorSlider")]
00206         [DefaultValue(0)]
00207         public int Minimum
00208         {
00209                 get { return barMinimum; }
00210                 set
00211                 {
00212                         if (value < barMaximum)
00213                         {
00214                                 barMinimum = value;
00215                                 if (trackerValue < barMinimum)
00216                                 {
00217                                         trackerValue = barMinimum;
00218                                         if (ValueChanged != null) ValueChanged(this, new EventArgs());
00219                                 }
00220                                 Invalidate();
00221                         }
00222                         else throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("Minimal value is greather than maximal one");
00223                 }
00224         }

00509         #region Color schemas
00510 
00511         //define own color schemas
00512         private Color[,] aColorSchema = new Color[,]
00513             {
00514                 {
00515                     Color.White, Color.Gainsboro, Color.Silver, Color.SkyBlue, Color.DarkSlateBlue, Color.Gainsboro,
00516                     Color.DarkGreen, Color.Chartreuse
00517                 },
00518                 {
00519                     Color.White, Color.Gainsboro, Color.Silver, Color.Red, Color.DarkRed, Color.Gainsboro, Color.Coral,
00520                     Color.LightCoral
00521                 },
00522                 {
00523                     Color.White, Color.Gainsboro, Color.Silver, Color.GreenYellow, Color.Yellow, Color.Gold, Color.Orange,
00524                     Color.OrangeRed
00525                 },
00526                 {
00527                     Color.White, Color.Gainsboro, Color.Silver, Color.Red, Color.Crimson, Color.Gainsboro, Color.DarkViolet
00528                     , Color.Violet
00529                 }
00530             };
00531 
00532         public enum ColorSchemas
00533         {
00534                 PerlBlueGreen,
00535                 PerlRedCoral,
00536                 PerlGold,
00537                 PerlRoyalColors
00538         }
00539 
00540         private ColorSchemas colorSchema = ColorSchemas.PerlBlueGreen;
00545         [Description("Set Slider color schema. Has no effect when slider colors are changed manually after schema was applied.")]
00546         [Category("ColorSlider")]
00547         [DefaultValue(typeof(ColorSchemas), "PerlBlueGreen")]
00548         public ColorSchemas ColorSchema
00549         {
00550                 get { return colorSchema; }
00551                 set
00552                 {
00553                         colorSchema = value;
00554                         byte sn = (byte)value;
00555                         thumbOuterColor = aColorSchema[sn, 0];
00556                         thumbInnerColor = aColorSchema[sn, 1];
00557                         thumbPenColor = aColorSchema[sn, 2];
00558                         barOuterColor = aColorSchema[sn, 3];
00559                         barInnerColor = aColorSchema[sn, 4];
00560                         barPenColor = aColorSchema[sn, 5];
00561                         elapsedOuterColor = aColorSchema[sn, 6];
00562                         elapsedInnerColor = aColorSchema[sn, 7];
00563 
00564                         Invalidate();
00565                 }
00566         }

00578         public ToolStripSlider(int min, int max, int value)
00579         {
00580                 InitializeComponent();
00581                 BackColor = Color.Transparent;
00582 
00583                 Minimum = min;
00584                 Maximum = max;
00585                 Value = value;
00586         }

00594 
00595         #region Paint
00596 
00601         protected override void OnPaint(PaintEventArgs e)
00602         {
00603                 if (!Enabled)
00604                 {
00605                         Color[] desaturatedColors = DesaturateColors(thumbOuterColor, thumbInnerColor, thumbPenColor,
00606                                                                                                                  barOuterColor, barInnerColor, barPenColor,
00607                                                                                                                  elapsedOuterColor, elapsedInnerColor);
00608                         DrawColorSlider(e, desaturatedColors[0], desaturatedColors[1], desaturatedColors[2],
00609                                                         desaturatedColors[3],
00610                                                         desaturatedColors[4], desaturatedColors[5], desaturatedColors[6], desaturatedColors[7]);
00611                 }
00612                 else
00613                 {
00614                         if (mouseEffects && mouseInRegion)
00615                         {
00616                                 Color[] lightenedColors = LightenColors(thumbOuterColor, thumbInnerColor, thumbPenColor,
00617                                                                                                                 barOuterColor, barInnerColor, barPenColor,
00618                                                                                                                 elapsedOuterColor, elapsedInnerColor);
00619                                 DrawColorSlider(e, lightenedColors[0], lightenedColors[1], lightenedColors[2], lightenedColors[3],
00620                                                                 lightenedColors[4], lightenedColors[5], lightenedColors[6], lightenedColors[7]);
00621                         }
00622                         else
00623                         {
00624                                 DrawColorSlider(e, thumbOuterColor, thumbInnerColor, thumbPenColor,
00625                                                                 barOuterColor, barInnerColor, barPenColor,
00626                                                                 elapsedOuterColor, elapsedInnerColor);
00627                         }
00628                 }
00629         }
00630 
00643         private void DrawColorSlider(PaintEventArgs e, Color thumbOuterColorPaint, Color thumbInnerColorPaint,
00644                                                                  Color thumbPenColorPaint, Color barOuterColorPaint, Color barInnerColorPaint,
00645                                                                  Color barPenColorPaint, Color elapsedOuterColorPaint, Color elapsedInnerColorPaint)
00646         {
00647                 //set up thumbRect aproprietly
00648                 if (barOrientation == Orientation.Horizontal)
00649                 {
00650                         int TrackX = (((trackerValue - barMinimum) * (this.ContentRectangle.Width - thumbSize)) / (barMaximum - barMinimum)) + 2;
00651                         thumbRect = new Rectangle(TrackX, 3, thumbSize - 1, this.ContentRectangle.Height - 3);
00652                 }
00653                 else
00654                 {
00655                         int TrackY = (((trackerValue - barMinimum) * (this.ContentRectangle.Height - thumbSize)) / (barMaximum - barMinimum));
00656                         thumbRect = new Rectangle(3, TrackY, this.ContentRectangle.Width - 3, thumbSize - 1);
00657                 }
00658 
00659                 //adjust drawing rects
00660                 barRect = this.ContentRectangle;
00661                 thumbHalfRect = thumbRect;
00662                 LinearGradientMode gradientOrientation;
00663                 if (barOrientation == Orientation.Horizontal)
00664                 {
00665                         barRect.Inflate(-1, -barRect.Height / 3);
00666                         barHalfRect = barRect;
00667                         barHalfRect.Height /= 2;
00668                         gradientOrientation = LinearGradientMode.Vertical;
00669                         thumbHalfRect.Height /= 2;
00670                         elapsedRect = barRect;
00671                         elapsedRect.Width = thumbRect.Left + thumbSize / 2;
00672                 }
00673                 else
00674                 {
00675                         barRect.Inflate(-barRect.Width / 3, -1);
00676                         barHalfRect = barRect;
00677                         barHalfRect.Width /= 2;
00678                         gradientOrientation = LinearGradientMode.Horizontal;
00679                         thumbHalfRect.Width /= 2;
00680                         elapsedRect = barRect;
00681                         elapsedRect.Height = thumbRect.Top + thumbSize / 2;
00682                 }
00683                 //get thumb shape path 
00684                 GraphicsPath thumbPath;
00685                 if (thumbCustomShape == null)
00686                         thumbPath = CreateRoundRectPath(thumbRect, thumbRoundRectSize);
00687                 else
00688                 {
00689                         thumbPath = thumbCustomShape;
00690                         Matrix m = new Matrix();
00691                         m.Translate(thumbRect.Left - thumbPath.GetBounds().Left, thumbRect.Top - thumbPath.GetBounds().Top);
00692                         thumbPath.Transform(m);
00693                 }
00694 
00695                 //draw bar
00696                 using (
00697                         LinearGradientBrush lgbBar =
00698                                 new LinearGradientBrush(barHalfRect, barOuterColorPaint, barInnerColorPaint, gradientOrientation)
00699                         )
00700                 {
00701                         lgbBar.WrapMode = WrapMode.TileFlipXY;
00702                         e.Graphics.FillRectangle(lgbBar, barRect);
00703                         //draw elapsed bar
00704                         using (
00705                                 LinearGradientBrush lgbElapsed =
00706                                         new LinearGradientBrush(barHalfRect, elapsedOuterColorPaint, elapsedInnerColorPaint,
00707                                                                                         gradientOrientation))
00708                         {
00709                                 lgbElapsed.WrapMode = WrapMode.TileFlipXY;
00710                                 if (Selected && drawSemitransparentThumb)
00711                                 {
00712                                         Region elapsedReg = new Region(elapsedRect);
00713                                         elapsedReg.Exclude(thumbPath);
00714                                         e.Graphics.FillRegion(lgbElapsed, elapsedReg);
00715                                 }
00716                                 else
00717                                         e.Graphics.FillRectangle(lgbElapsed, elapsedRect);
00718                         }
00719                         //draw bar band                    
00720                         using (Pen barPen = new Pen(barPenColorPaint, 0.5f))
00721                         {
00722                                 e.Graphics.DrawRectangle(barPen, barRect);
00723                         }
00724                 }
00725 
00726                 //draw thumb
00727                 Color newthumbOuterColorPaint = thumbOuterColorPaint, newthumbInnerColorPaint = thumbInnerColorPaint;
00728                 if (Selected && drawSemitransparentThumb)
00729                 {
00730                         newthumbOuterColorPaint = Color.FromArgb(175, thumbOuterColorPaint);
00731                         newthumbInnerColorPaint = Color.FromArgb(175, thumbInnerColorPaint);
00732                 }
00733                 using (
00734                         LinearGradientBrush lgbThumb =
00735                                 new LinearGradientBrush(thumbHalfRect, newthumbOuterColorPaint, newthumbInnerColorPaint,
00736                                                                                 gradientOrientation))
00737                 {
00738                         lgbThumb.WrapMode = WrapMode.TileFlipXY;
00739                         e.Graphics.SmoothingMode = SmoothingMode.AntiAlias;
00740                         e.Graphics.FillPath(lgbThumb, thumbPath);
00741                         //draw thumb band
00742                         Color newThumbPenColor = thumbPenColorPaint;
00743                         if (mouseEffects && (Selected || mouseInThumbRegion))
00744                                 newThumbPenColor = ControlPaint.Dark(newThumbPenColor);
00745                         using (Pen thumbPen = new Pen(newThumbPenColor))
00746                         {
00747                                 e.Graphics.DrawPath(thumbPen, thumbPath);
00748                         }
00749                         //gp.Dispose();                    
00750                         /*if (Capture || mouseInThumbRegion)
00751                                 using (LinearGradientBrush lgbThumb2 = new LinearGradientBrush(thumbHalfRect, Color.FromArgb(150, Color.Blue), Color.Transparent, gradientOrientation))
00752                                 {
00753                                         lgbThumb2.WrapMode = WrapMode.TileFlipXY;
00754                                         e.Graphics.FillPath(lgbThumb2, gp);
00755                                 }*/
00756                 }
00757         }
00758 
00759         #endregion
00760 
00761         #region Overided events
00762 
00763         private bool mouseInRegion = false;
00768         protected override void OnEnabledChanged(EventArgs e)
00769         {
00770                 base.OnEnabledChanged(e);
00771                 Invalidate();
00772         }
00773 
00778         protected override void OnMouseEnter(EventArgs e)
00779         {
00780                 base.OnMouseEnter(e);
00781                 mouseInRegion = true;
00782                 Invalidate();
00783         }
00784 
00789         protected override void OnMouseLeave(EventArgs e)
00790         {
00791                 base.OnMouseLeave(e);
00792                 mouseInRegion = false;
00793                 mouseInThumbRegion = false;
00794                 Invalidate();
00795         }
00796 
00801         protected override void OnMouseDown(MouseEventArgs e)
00802         {
00803                 base.OnMouseDown(e);
00804                 if (e.Button == MouseButtons.Left)
00805                 {
00806                         if (Scroll != null) Scroll(this, new ScrollEventArgs(ScrollEventType.ThumbTrack, trackerValue));
00807                         if (ValueChanged != null) ValueChanged(this, new EventArgs());
00808                         OnMouseMove(e);
00809                 }
00810         }
00811 
00812         private bool mouseInThumbRegion = false;
00813 
00818         protected override void OnMouseMove(MouseEventArgs e)
00819         {
00820                 base.OnMouseMove(e);
00821                 mouseInThumbRegion = IsPointInRect(e.Location, thumbRect);
00822                 if (Selected & e.Button == MouseButtons.Left)
00823                 {
00824                         ScrollEventType set = ScrollEventType.ThumbPosition;
00825                         Point pt = e.Location;
00826                         int p = barOrientation == Orientation.Horizontal ? pt.X : pt.Y;
00827                         int margin = thumbSize >> 1;
00828                         p -= margin;
00829                         float coef = (float)(barMaximum - barMinimum) /
00830                                                  (float)
00831                                                  ((barOrientation == Orientation.Horizontal ? this.ContentRectangle.Width : this.ContentRectangle.Height) -
00832                                                   2 * margin);
00833                         trackerValue = (int)(p * coef + barMinimum);
00834 
00835                         if (trackerValue <= barMinimum)
00836                         {
00837                                 trackerValue = barMinimum;
00838                                 set = ScrollEventType.First;
00839                         }
00840                         else if (trackerValue >= barMaximum)
00841                         {
00842                                 trackerValue = barMaximum;
00843                                 set = ScrollEventType.Last;
00844                         }
00845 
00846                         if (Scroll != null) Scroll(this, new ScrollEventArgs(set, trackerValue));
00847                         if (ValueChanged != null) ValueChanged(this, new EventArgs());
00848                 }
00849                 Invalidate();
00850         }
00851 
00856         protected override void OnMouseUp(MouseEventArgs e)
00857         {
00858                 base.OnMouseUp(e);
00859                 mouseInThumbRegion = IsPointInRect(e.Location, thumbRect);
00860                 if (Scroll != null) Scroll(this, new ScrollEventArgs(ScrollEventType.EndScroll, trackerValue));
00861                 if (ValueChanged != null) ValueChanged(this, new EventArgs());
00862                 Invalidate();
00863         }
00864         #endregion
00865 
00866         #region Help routines
00867 
00874         public static GraphicsPath CreateRoundRectPath(Rectangle rect, Size size)
00875         {
00876                 GraphicsPath gp = new GraphicsPath();
00877                 gp.AddLine(rect.Left + size.Width / 2, rect.Top, rect.Right - size.Width / 2, rect.Top);
00878                 gp.AddArc(rect.Right - size.Width, rect.Top, size.Width, size.Height, 270, 90);
00879 
00880                 gp.AddLine(rect.Right, rect.Top + size.Height / 2, rect.Right, rect.Bottom - size.Width / 2);
00881                 gp.AddArc(rect.Right - size.Width, rect.Bottom - size.Height, size.Width, size.Height, 0, 90);
00882 
00883                 gp.AddLine(rect.Right - size.Width / 2, rect.Bottom, rect.Left + size.Width / 2, rect.Bottom);
00884                 gp.AddArc(rect.Left, rect.Bottom - size.Height, size.Width, size.Height, 90, 90);
00885 
00886                 gp.AddLine(rect.Left, rect.Bottom - size.Height / 2, rect.Left, rect.Top + size.Height / 2);
00887                 gp.AddArc(rect.Left, rect.Top, size.Width, size.Height, 180, 90);
00888                 return gp;
00889         }
00890 
00896         public static Color[] DesaturateColors(params Color[] colorsToDesaturate)
00897         {
00898                 Color[] colorsToReturn = new Color[colorsToDesaturate.Length];
00899                 for (int i = 0; i < colorsToDesaturate.Length; i++)
00900                 {
00901                         //use NTSC weighted avarage
00902                         int gray =
00903                                 (int)(colorsToDesaturate[i].R * 0.3 + colorsToDesaturate[i].G * 0.6 + colorsToDesaturate[i].B * 0.1);
00904                         colorsToReturn[i] = Color.FromArgb(-0x010101 * (255 - gray) - 1);
00905                 }
00906                 return colorsToReturn;
00907         }
00908 
00914         public static Color[] LightenColors(params Color[] colorsToLighten)
00915         {
00916                 Color[] colorsToReturn = new Color[colorsToLighten.Length];
00917                 for (int i = 0; i < colorsToLighten.Length; i++)
00918                 {
00919                         colorsToReturn[i] = ControlPaint.Light(colorsToLighten[i]);
00920                 }
00921                 return colorsToReturn;
00922         }
00923 
00928         private void SetProperValue(int val)
00929         {
00930                 if (val < barMinimum) Value = barMinimum;
00931                 else if (val > barMaximum) Value = barMaximum;
00932                 else Value = val;
00933         }
00934 
00943         private static bool IsPointInRect(Point pt, Rectangle rect)
00944         {
00945                 if (pt.X > rect.Left & pt.X < rect.Right & pt.Y > rect.Top & pt.Y < rect.Bottom)
00946                         return true;
00947                 else return false;
00948         }
